speaker: Neta Haiby
title: Extract information from your documents with new capabilities in Form Recognizer
description:
Documents contain invaluable information powering core business processes. Extracting information from these documents with minimum manual intervention helps bolster organizational efficiency and productivity. As more and more processes and workflows get automated, the need for new features to help extract text and structures increases. The new capabilities in Form Recognizer which were announced at Ignite support pre-built IDs, invoices and 73 new languages. 

For the very latest on Azure Form Recognizer see Vinod Kurpad's February 2022 episode:
https://youtu.be/86cZgYJdRGc
